text:
Lisa’s Weekend Trip

Lisa usually stays at home on weekends, but last Saturday she decided to do something different. She woke up early and took a train to the city with her friend Anna.

First, they visited a big museum. Lisa enjoyed the paintings, but Anna liked the old statues more. After the museum, they were hungry, so they ate lunch in a small café. Lisa had pasta, and Anna chose pizza.

In the afternoon, they went shopping. Lisa bought a new jacket because it was on sale, and Anna bought a pair of shoes. They also took many photos together.

In the evening, they returned home tired but happy. Lisa thought, “This was the best Saturday in a long time!”

subquestions.text: Lisa usually ____ (travels / stays at home** / works) on weekends.
She went to the city with ____ (her brother / Anna** / her teacher).
At the museum, Anna liked the ____ (paintings / statues** / photos).
For lunch, Lisa had ____ (pizza / pasta** / salad).
Lisa bought a new ____ (jacket** / bag / phone) because it was on sale.
In the evening they felt ____ (angry / tired but happy** / bored).
